name: Will Bridge: Practice 3: Advanced
overview: WILL BRIDGE-Practice 3: Standard\Advanced. The set-PRACTICE has been developed for you to improve your bridge at the Advanced level. Offered in a GAME FORMAT it enables you to make rapid progress, regardless of your level. Endorsed by the European Bridge League. 1-INTRODUCTION TO BIDDING 2-INTERMEDIATE 3-ADVANCED 4-COMPETITION 5-ADVANCED COMPETITION
